title: Portfolio
description: Personal portfolio website showcasing skills, projects, and contact information with interactive animations and modern UI.

title: Clubs Management System
description: Full web application for managing clubs, members, and activities using a graph database model with advanced relationships and a recommandation system.

title: Stock Management System
description: Inventory management system to track stock levels, manage products, and handle suppliers and transactions.

title: ChatAppJava
description: Java-based chat application allowing real-time messaging between users with a graphical user interface.

title: Admin Dashboard
description: Responsive admin dashboard with charts, tables, and interactive UI components for managing application data.

title: Laravel React Chat Application
description: Real-time chat using Laravel backend and React frontend with live notifications and message storing.

title: Association Website
description: Website for an association with information pages, contact forms, and dynamic content built with Laravel.

title: Laravel Product CRUD
description: CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) product management system built with Laravel for backend operations.

title: XO Game
description: Classic Tic-Tac-Toe (X/O) game implementation with interactive gameplay in the browser.
